meta.description: Labels for Record Editing screen (typical TCEforms surroundings).

languageKey.label: Delete
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Undo/Redo last change (%s ago)
View record change history
Edit whole record
OPEN DOCUMENTS
No open documents
There are no open documents available to edit.
You can go to %s to find the page or the record you wish to edit.
You can select one of your most recently edited records from this list:
the Web>Page module
or
the Web>List module
